channel.title: [RuneSource 317]RuneFocus v1.0
channel.description:
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg690/scaled.php?server=690&filename=runefocusbanner.png&res=medium[/img]
Hello. The first time I've seen a RuneSource, I've wanted to do something out of it. Most RuneSource's/Azure are being released only with skills, with not much features and practicly no combat.
RuneSource 317: Azure: v1.0
I`ve been working on this for a bit, and this is what I got out:
[b]Features[/b]
[ul][li]Fishing Base[/li] [li]WoodCutting started from scratch[/li] [li]Full Herblore[/li] [li]Crafting (cutting Gems/leatherCrafting needs to be worked on.) - Level reqs, XP[/li] [li]Prayer[/li] [li]Fixed the shortbow glitch[/li] [li]Fixed ground item stacking[/li] [li]Fixed the equipment bug[/li] [li]All emotions[/li] [li]Teleporting[/li] [li]Teleporting with level requirments[/li] [li]Eating[/li] [li]Potioning- You can drink potions and all, just need to make so it power/etc up your skills..[/li] [li]Animation/gfx support[/li] [li]Few shops[/li] [li]Npc spawns[/li] [li]Loads global objects[/li] [li]Started a skilling base[/li] [li]Messaging[/li] [li]Split Chat[/li] [li]Wielding Level requirments[/li] [li]Yell system[/li] [li]PlayerEditor - edits a char file[/li][/ul] I will be releasing newer and newer version of RuneFocus, since I love to work on the RuneSource.
Pictures:
Emotions :) [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg42/scaled.php?server=42&filename=emotes.png&res=medium[/img] Fishing [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg695/scaled.php?server=695&filename=fishingo.png&res=medium[/img] Herb cleaning [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg850/scaled.php?server=850&filename=cleaningherbs.png&res=medium[/img] Making potions [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg27/scaled.php?server=27&filename=potionmaking.png&res=medium[/img] ~Eating/Potting~
[ul][li]All Food - All working[/li] [li]Almost all Potions - none working yet[/li][/ul] [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg716/scaled.php?server=716&filename=pottingandeating.png&res=medium[/img]
~Crafting gems~
[ul][li]Includes : sapphire,emerald,ruby,diamond,dragonstone and onyx[/li] [li]Level requirments[/li] [li]Animation[/li][/ul] [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg89/scaled.php?server=89&filename=gemcutting.png&res=medium[/img] LVL Req [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg824/scaled.php?server=824&filename=craftingwithrequirments.png&res=medium[/img] ~Leather Crafting~
[ul][li]Leather Crafting got just started it doesn't work yet, it only shows the Interface by using the needle on the dhide[/li][/ul] [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg839/scaled.php?server=839&filename=fletchingscratch.png&res=medium[/img] ~Teleporting~
[ul][li]Proper Gfx and timer[/li] [li]Proper animation[/li][/ul] [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg717/scaled.php?server=717&filename=teleporting.png&res=medium[/img] Basic yell system
[ul][li]Player[/li] [li]Moderator[/li] [li]Administrator[/li][/ul] [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg695/scaled.php?server=695&filename=yellsystem.png&res=medium[/img] ~Combat~
[ul][li]Need to be worked on, it`s just a base[/li] [li]Anims[/li] [li]facing[/li] [li]interfaces[/li][/ul] [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg705/scaled.php?server=705&filename=whipemote.png&res=medium[/img]
In my next Release, expect more fabulous stuff added to this great base.
Download Link: Uppit: [url=http://uppit.com/ayiqzq9nb6d2/RuneFocus_v1.0.rar]http://uppit.com/ayiqzq9nb6d2/RuneFocus_v1.0.rar[/url] Dropbox(Direct Download): [url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/36130389/RuneFocus%20v1.0.rar]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/36130389/RuneFocus%20v1.0.rar[/url]
[b]Credits:[/b]
[ul][li][b]Blakeman[/b][/li] [li][b]BFMV[/b][/li] [li][b]Satan666[/b][/li] [li][b]I Roll Deep[/b][/li][/ul]

item.description:
@I_Roll_Deep wrote:

Thanks guys, I really appreciate your comments.
I`m working now on the next Release, for now I made:

[ul][li]100% Fletching[/li]
[li]Crafting(leatherCrafting) 90% - Only have to finish the ButtonPacketHandler ID`s [/li]
[li]90% Cooking - ButtonPacketHandler Left[/li]
[li]Starting a better fishing system[/li][/ul]

This should be finished in 2 hours.

item.title: [RuneSource 317]RuneFocus v1.0
item.dc:creator: @I_Roll_Deep I Roll Deep
item.description:
@I_Roll_Deep wrote:

       [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg690/scaled.php?server=690&filename=runefocusbanner.png&res=medium[/img]

Hello. The first time I’ve seen a RuneSource, I’ve wanted to do something out of it.
Most RuneSource’s/Azure are being released only with skills, with not much features and practicly no combat.

RuneSource 317: Azure: v1.0

I`ve been working on this for a bit, and this is what I got out:

Features

[ul][li]Fishing Base[/li]
[li]WoodCutting started from scratch[/li]
[li]Full Herblore[/li]
[li]Crafting (cutting Gems/leatherCrafting needs to be worked on.) - Level reqs, XP[/li]
[li]Prayer[/li]
[li]Fixed the shortbow glitch[/li]
[li]Fixed ground item stacking[/li]
[li]Fixed the equipment bug[/li]
[li]All emotions[/li]
[li]Teleporting[/li]
[li]Teleporting with level requirments[/li]
[li]Eating[/li]
[li]Potioning- You can drink potions and all, just need to make so it power/etc up your skills…[/li]
[li]Animation/gfx support[/li]
[li]Few shops[/li]
[li]Npc spawns[/li]
[li]Loads global objects[/li]
[li]Started a skilling base[/li]
[li]Messaging[/li]
[li]Split Chat[/li]
[li]Wielding Level requirments[/li]
[li]Yell system[/li]
[li]PlayerEditor - edits a char file[/li][/ul]
I will be releasing newer and newer version of RuneFocus, since I love to work on the RuneSource.

Pictures:

Emotions

Fishing

Herb cleaning

Making potions

~Eating/Potting~

[ul][li]All Food - All working[/li]
[li]Almost all Potions - none working yet[/li][/ul]

~Crafting gems~

[ul][li]Includes : sapphire,emerald,ruby,diamond,dragonstone and onyx[/li]
[li]Level requirments[/li]
[li]Animation[/li][/ul]

LVL Req

~Leather Crafting~

[ul][li]Leather Crafting got just started it doesn’t work yet, it only shows the Interface by using the needle on the dhide[/li][/ul]

~Teleporting~

[ul][li]Proper Gfx and timer[/li]
[li]Proper animation[/li][/ul]

Basic yell system

[ul][li]Player[/li]
[li]Moderator[/li]
[li]Administrator[/li][/ul]

~Combat~

[ul][li]Need to be worked on, it`s just a base[/li]
[li]Anims[/li]
[li]facing[/li]
[li]interfaces[/li][/ul]

In my next Release, expect more fabulous stuff added to this great base.
